at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote.MoveableObject
      • at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote.Actor

  • public class Actor
extends MoveableObject
    Provides an actor for the user to play with
    Author:
    Michael Pointner
